question.title: Unable to render definition: Please indicate valid Swagger or OpenAPI version field. Supported version fields are swagger: "2.0"
question.body:
I have referred several text around the web around this issue but not sure why the swagger is not coming up locally the verification is working fine but UI is showing up below error

I have recently upgraded the Spring Boot version to 3.4.5 and below are the versions which I am using for below dependencies

  1. io.swagger.core.v3:swagger-annotations-jakarta:jar:2.2.25

  2. io.swagger.core.v3:swagger-core:2.2.25

  3. io.swagger.core.v3:swagger-models:2.2.25

  4. org.springdoc:springdoc-openapi-starter-common:2.2.25

  5. io.swagger.core.v3:swagger-annotations-jakarta:jar:2.2.25

  6. com.fasterxml.jackson.core -> 2.18.3 BOM

  7. springdoc-openapi-starter-common: 2.7

  8. springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui: 2.7

  9. springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-api: 2.7

in application.yml below are the properties for spring doc

springdoc:
  default-produces-media-type: application/json
  swagger-ui:
    disable-swagger-default-url: true
    query-config-enabled: true
    path: /swagger-ui.html
  api-docs:
    path: /v3/api-docs
    version: openapi_3_0

In config where we have overrides WebMvcConfigurer below is the config

@Override
    public void configureMessageConverters(List<HttpMessageConverter<?>> converters) {
        converters.add(new StringHttpMessageConverter());
        converters.add(new ByteArrayHttpMessageConverter());
        converters.add(new MappingJackson2HttpMessageConverter(objectMapper()));
    }

    public ObjectMapper objectMapper() {
        val mapper = new ObjectMapper();
        mapper.setSerializationInclusion(JsonInclude.Include.ALWAYS);
        mapper.registerModule(new JsonNullableModule());
        mapper.registerModule(new JavaTimeModule());
        mapper.registerModule(new Jdk8Module());
        mapper.configure(SerializationFeature.WRITE_DATES_AS_TIMESTAMPS, false);
        mapper.configure(DeserializationFeature.FAIL_ON_UNKNOWN_PROPERTIES, false);
        return mapper;
    }

Referred this as well: Swagger..Unable to render this definition The provided definition does not specify a valid version field

This is a pom based project sharing the pom file can't share complete pom

  <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
            <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-common</artifactId>
            <version>2.7.0</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
            <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui</artifactId>
            <version>2.7.0</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
            <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-api</artifactId>
            <version>2.7.0</version>
        </dependency>

answers.body:
There was a conflicting dependency for io.swagger.core.v3:swagger-annotations from another dependency in my pom. I have added an exclusion for the same and removed following from pom this fixed the problem at my side

<dependency>
            <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
            <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-common</artifactId>
            <version>2.7.0</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
            <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui</artifactId>
            <version>2.7.0</version>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
            <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-api</artifactId>
            <version>2.7.0</version>
        </dependency>

I think. in application.yaml, below line is not required:

version: openapi_3_0

Try this in pom:

<dependencyManagement>
  <dependencies>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
      <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-bom</artifactId>
      <version>2.8.8</version>
      <type>pom</type>
      <scope>import</scope>
    </dependency>
  </dependencies>
</dependencyManagement>

<dependencies>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
    <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-common</artifactId>
  </dependency>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
    <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui</artifactId>
  </dependency>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>org.springdoc</groupId>
    <artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-api</artifactId>
  </dependency>
</dependencies>

question_comments.body: Check out this, it's working fine:  Spring-boot: ------ <parent> 		<groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> 		<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> 		<version>3.4.5</version> 		<relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository --> 	</parent> ------------ openApi: <dependency> 			<groupId>org.springdoc</groupId> 			<artifactId>springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui</artifact‌​Id> 			<version>2.7.0</version> <!-- Use the latest appropriate version --> 		</dependency>
@MdWahidulAzam I have added the relevant dependencies version and some part from pom file as well. Let me know if you need version for specific dependency from the project
If it's a gradle project, then share gradle.build file, if maven, then share POM. There must be a version compatibility issue.

79607435.body: Thank you for your response, I have tried but still not working :-(
